Title: Paladin Calling
Description:
Adds a simple Mechanimist paladin calling, complete with a custom sprite.

Class features:
[list]
[*]+2 Strength
[*]Cudgel
[*]Shield
[*]Shield Slam
[*]Charge
[*]+300 reputation with the Mechanimists
[/list]

Starting equipment:
[list]
[*]Iron Mace
[*]Steel Shield
[*]Leather Armor
[/list]

Starting items:
[list]
[*]1 copy of The Canticles Chromaic, Verses XVII-XXIV
[*]9-15 torches
[*]2 empty waterskins
[*]2 waterskin with 32 drams of fresh water each
[*]8-10 crusty loaves
[*]2-3 witchwood bark
[/list]
